tool_description: Aggregates multiple risk scores and behavioral indicators into a comprehensive customer risk profile with weighted scoring and risk categorization.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for risk profile aggregation

risk_scores.description: Array of individual risk scores to aggregate

score_weights.description: Weights for each risk score in aggregation

aggregation_method.description: Method for score aggregation: weighted_average, maximum, or hybrid

error_messages: Score-weight mismatch: risk_scores and score_weights arrays must have the same length
Invalid aggregation method: aggregation_method must be one of [weighted_average, maximum, hybrid]
Invalid risk scores: All risk scores must be between 0 and 100
Invalid weights: All score weights must be positive numbers and should sum to 1.0
Empty input data: risk_scores cannot be empty
usage: Provide customer_id, risk_scores array, and corresponding score_weights. Optionally specify aggregation_method and custom risk_categories for tailored risk profiling.

risk_category.description: Risk category classification based on aggregated score

contributing_factors.description: Primary risk factors contributing to the final score

confidence_level.description: Confidence level in the aggregated risk assessment
